name: Belted Poncho Tunic Top
description:
Poncho Style Belted Tunic 

Don't you just love this top?

This is the newest addition to my collection. Pair it with a pair of white skinny leg jeans and you'll have a winner. Top available in size Small through medium. Fabric selection will be all up to you. Just give me a color sheme and I'll provide you with fabric samples in those colors. name: Single Shoulder Belted Dress
description:
Single Shoulder Dress

Size shown 6/8

Available in sizes

6 thru 18

Lyn La'Rue Original. This dress was really a shirt and I liked the top so much I added dress length to it. This sexy single shoulder belted dress or tunic top comes with endless possibilities for pattern selection and can be customized to fit your color palette. The cost of this item is $35 for the dress and $25 for the tunic top. Fabric samples available upon request. Please submit all inquiries to ur.flayr@gmail.com. Free shipping in the U.S. Thx and Happy Shopping!!!

name: Sleeveless Wrap Dress
description:
Sleeveless Wrap Dress 
Size 22
(Pinned to show on dress form)



How can you go wrong with this form fitting and forgiving wrap dress. I myself never really lost the baby pouch but with this dress that's our little secret. (wink) Whether that's your issue or not, the hour glass shape awaits. This dress is so versitile you won't have to make that work to evening wear change. Your ready for whatever. My goal for Flayr is to make quality custom affordable garments. Just $60 for this pleasing investment. Free standard shipping in US. Happy Shopping!!!

name: Pleated Waist Bell Sleeve Dress
description: This dress requires no description because it truly speaks for itself. I made this dress to wear for Valentine's Day night out with my hubby. He was floored with the look. Very chic wouldn't you say? I love it! And if you feel the same I'd be happy to make one especially for you. This dress has a very tailored fit and will require me to have your Bust, Waist, and Hip measurement. If you do not know your measurements we can definitely get them for you. It will take a few extra days for me to help get your measurements as we will be working on this via post office. The regular turn around for this item is 7-10 days after receiving your order. This should include shipping time as long as the post office is not backed up. The cost of this fab dress is $60 including fabric and shipping. To place an order you may call me directly at 901-572-0504 or email me at ur.flayr@gmail.com. thx and Happy Shopping

name: Drawstring Sleeved Belted Top
description:
Drawstring Sleeved Belted Top 

This top is just neat. You will really be a trendsetter in this one. The drawstring sleeves can be adjusted to your desired length. The other option for this one is shorter sleeves with or without the drawstring and no belt. The top is very versatile and can be paired with shorts, jeans, or skirt. If you are looking for a piece that will be an attention getter and conversation piece, look no further. This item comes in sizes small thru 2x. The turnover time for this item is 10 days. The cost is $35 which includes fabric and labor. Add $5.00 for shipping in the U.S. To set up consult, email me at ur.flayr@gmail.com . Thx and Happy Shopping!!!

name: Cut-Out Shift Dress
description: Edgy Shift Dress. You are truly gonna love this one! This shift dress is very versitile in design. For example: you could simply select for it to be made in a solid color or it can be made in a combination of 2 colors (ex. shown). This dress also comes without the cut out and zippers at both front seams (I will have a sample of this dress posted). With this you can also select to have multiple colors in the front of the dress. I know you all will enjoy the wear of this one. The cost of this item is $40. Fabric and shipping in the U.S. included. For measurement consult email me at ur.flayr@gmail.com. Thanks and Happy Shopping!!!

Ready for Summer.  Send you email for consultation to ur.flayr@gmail.com .
